name: Sushi Craft
description:
Roll, chop, serve in Sushi Craft!

Sushi might be the most beautiful food in the world. In Sushi Craft, you have the chance to create something wonderful. Give it your best, and put your heart into your sashimi.

Start by collecting the Nori, or other outer layer of your sushi. Prepare yourself and centre your mind.

Add the rice and combine with the filling. Follow the platform with your snaking roll and include every step to create the perfect taste experience.

When your roll is prepared, guide it through the knife to prepare the perfect individual pieces, ready for eating.

But the work isn't done! Each piece has the potential to reach the stars and dazzle with delicate finishing touches, garnish, and culinary passion!

The more sushi you prepare and the better the final product, the higher the score you can achieve. Rise up from a humble hobbyist to a Master Itamae.

Serve beautiful sushi in Sushi Craft!
